Survival data

Source: vignettes/survival_data.Rmd
survival_data.Rmd
library(micRo)

Plotting survival data in a classical way with a survival plot (Kaplan-Meyer and others) may be considered as micro data due to each step representing an individual event and thereby micro data. Based on the discussion in this GitHub issue thread, here are some working examples as to creating smoothed survival plots.

Developed by Andreas Gammelgaard Damsbo.

Site built with pkgdown 2.1.0.
